Did some reading into Hong Fok (Property developer) currently trading $1.05/$1.06Here’s why I feel current price good bargain.1) NAV : $3.0892) Net Gearing Ration : 28% based on FY21(Very healthy for property developer)3) Insider bought $1.05 in aug224) Share buy backs aplenty and highest buy back at $1.03 this year 29th Aug 225) Property market doing exceptionally well and we can expect a revaluation of their current investment property developments which will bring up its NAV by even more.With property industry being robust  this counter being very undervalued  safety net at $1.05 (insider buying)   $1.03 Share buy back  safe debt-equity ratio  this one ☝️ to me is cheap by valuation and with so recent trend activity in privatisation  this one’s could be a good candidate.Current price seems a very good bargain considering that they attempted a break out at $1.15 recently. This flush is good to collect.Buy call $1.05  same price as insider. This feels like a very good durian at this price
This one may be some corporate action coming?
